pkgsearch 3.0.3.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Advanced CRAN package search

Source: R/advanced_search.R
advanced_search.Rd

See the Elastic documentation for the syntax and features: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl-query-string-query.html

advanced_search(
  ...,
  json = NULL,
  format = c("short", "long"),
  from = 1,
  size = 10
)

Arguments

...

Search terms. For named terms, the name specifies the field to search for. For unnamed ones, the term is taken as is. The individual terms are combined with the AND operator.
json

A character string that contains the query to send to Elastic. If this is not NULL, then you cannot specify any search terms in ....
format

Default formatting of the results. short only outputs the name and title of the packages, long also prints the author, last version, full description and URLs. Note that this only affects the default printing, and you can still inspect the full results, even if you specify short here.
from

Where to start listing the results, for pagination.
size

The number of results to list.

Value

Search hits.

Examples

# All orphaned packages
advanced_search(Maintainer = "ORPHANED")

#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 37 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package        version   by         @ title                            
#>   1 100 Funclustering  1.0.2     ORPHANED  2y Functional Data Clustering       
#>   2 100 distances      0.1.8     ORPHANED  2y Tools for Distance Metrics       
#>   3 100 mvcwt          1.3.1     ORPHANED  2y Wavelet Analysis of Multiple T...
#>   4  96 NanoStringNorm 1.2.1.1   ORPHANED  7M Normalize NanoString miRNA and...
#>   5  96 SDMTools       1.1.221.2 ORPHANED  1y Species Distribution Modelling...
#>   6  96 datadr         0.8.6.1   ORPHANED  3y Divide and Recombine for Large...
#>   7  96 nhlscrapr      1.8.1     ORPHANED  4y Compiling the NHL Real Time Sc...
#>   8  86 ggmap          3.0.0     ORPHANED  2y Spatial Visualization with ggp...
#>   9  86 gWidgetstcltk  0.0.55.1  ORPHANED  1y Toolkit implementation of gWid...
#>  10  86 gWidgets       0.0.54.2  ORPHANED  1y gWidgets API for Building Tool...

# Packages with both Hester and Wickham as authors
advanced_search(Author = "Hester", Author = "Wickham")

#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 17 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package     version by             @ title                             
#>   1 100 pkgbuild    1.2.0   Jim Hester    4M Find Tools Needed to Build R Pa...
#>   2  86 devtools    2.4.0   Jim Hester    4d Tools to Make Developing R Pack...
#>   3  80 sessioninfo 1.1.1   Gábor Csárdi  2y R Session Information             
#>   4  70 memoise     2.0.0   Jim Hester    2M Memoisation of Functions          
#>   5  68 xml2        1.3.2   Jim Hester    1y Parse XML                         
#>   6  64 odbc        1.3.2   Jim Hester    8d Connect to ODBC Compatible Data...
#>   7  62 withr       2.4.1   Jim Hester    2M Run Code 'With' Temporarily Mod...
#>   8  61 pkgload     1.2.1   Jim Hester    5d Simulate Package Installation a...
#>   9  60 fs          1.5.0   Jim Hester    8M Cross-Platform File System Oper...
#>  10  60 remotes     2.3.0   Jim Hester   10d R Package Installation from Rem...
advanced_search("Author: Hester AND Author: Wickham")

#> - "advanced search" ---------------------------- 17 packages in 0.001 seconds -

# Packages with Hester but not Wickham as author
advanced_search(Author = "Hester AND NOT Wickham")

# Packages for permutation tests and permissive licenses
advanced_search("permutation test AND NOT License: GPL OR GNU")

# Packages that have a certain field
advanced_search("_exists_" = "URL")

#> - "advanced search" -------------------------- 9557 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package     version by                      @ title                    
#>   1 100 exploratory 0.1.53  Jin Kim               20d Conduct Exploratory An...

# Packages that do not have a certain field:
advanced_search("NOT _exists_: URL")

#> - "advanced search" -------------------------- 9504 packages in 0.001 seconds -
#>   #     package    version by                         @ title

#>   9 100 miselect   0.9.0   Alexander Rix             1y Variable Selection f...
#>  10 100 PCAmixdata 3.1     Marie Chavent             3y Multivariate Analysi...

# The same but as JSON query
query <- '{
"query": {
  "bool": {
    "must_not": {
      "exists": {
        "field": "URL"
      }
    }
  }
}
}'
advanced_search(json = query)

#> - "advanced search" ------------------------------ 9504 packages in 0 seconds -
#>   #     package    version by                         @ title                  
#>   1 100 ADCT       0.1.0   Yalin Zhu                 4y Adaptive Design in C...

# Regular expressions
advanced_search(Author = "/Joh?nathan/")

# Fuzzy search
advanced_search(Author = "Johnathan~1")
